snippet: As part of the Armory Youth Corps, students are getting a hands-on course in history, helping to digitize thousands of photographs the military left to the Park Avenue Armory Conservancy.
abstract: As part of the Armory Youth Corps, students are getting a hands-on course in history, helping to digitize thousands of photographs the military left to the Park Avenue Armory Conservancy.

headline.main: Behind the Scenes at the Armory, an Immersion Course in History
